package.name: timeSeriesStatsDailyAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the daily time series stats analysis member.

package.name: timeSeriesStatsMonthlyAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the monthly mean time series stats analysis member.

package.name: timeSeriesStatsMonthlyMaxAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the monthly max time series stats analysis member.

package.name: timeSeriesStatsMonthlyMinAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the monthly min time series stats analysis member.

package.name: timeSeriesStatsClimatologyAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the climatology time series stats analysis member.

package.name: timeSeriesStatsCustomAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the custom time series stats analysis member.

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeSeriesStats_CFcompliant
nml_option.description: This is the timeSeriesStats analysis member that can write out time and time_bnds with no suffixes.
nml_option.possible_values: Any valid time series analysis member, i.e. 'timeSeriesStatsMonthly', or 'none'

nml_option.name: config_AM_timeSeriesStats_CF_start_date
nml_option.description: Starte date for CF compliant clock

var.name: time
var.description: Represents the middle time point of each measurement

var.name: time_bnds
var.description: Start and end points of each time step
